mapper.select: /* DlvrRegistMapper.getDlvrManageList */ SELECT STORE_CD , DLVR_LZONE_CD , DLVR_LZONE_NM , PAGE_NO , EMP_NO , IN_FG , USE_YN , REG_DT , REG_ID , MOD_DT , MOD_ID FROM TB_MS_DELIVERY_LZONE WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND STORE_CD = #{storeCd} ORDER BY PAGE_NO

/* DlvrRegistMapper.dlvrDetailList */ SELECT STORE_CD , DLVR_MZONE_CD , DLVR_MZONE_NM , DLVR_LZONE_CD , PAGE_NO , EMP_NO , SBPENC.D(DLVR_ADDR) AS DLVR_ADDR , IN_FG , USE_YN , REG_DT , REG_ID , MOD_DT , MOD_ID FROM TB_MS_DELIVERY_MZONE WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND DLVR_LZONE_CD = #{dlvrLzoneCd} ORDER BY PAGE_NO
